languages.text: {n}Соломон притягивает вас к себе, его ладони тверды будто камень, но прикосновения их полны трепета и нежности. Вы смотрите друг другу в глаза, и огни пожара смазываются, превращаясь в светящиеся полосы, и вскоре в водовороте пламени остаетесь только вы и он.{/n}

{n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон притягивает вас к себе, его ладони тверды будто камень, но прикосновения их полны трепета и нежности. Вы смотрите друг другу в глаза, и огни пожара смазываются, превращаясь в светящиеся полосы, и вскоре в водовороте пламени остаетесь только вы и он.{/n}

{n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンがあなたを引き寄せた。彼の手は石のように硬かったが、その触れ方には恐れと優しさがあった。お互いの目を見つめ合うと、炎はぼやけ、輝く光の筋へと変わっていき、やがて炎の渦の中に、あなたと彼だけが残った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンがあなたを引き寄せた。彼の手は石のように硬かったが、その触れ方には恐れと優しさがあった。お互いの目を見つめ合うと、炎はぼやけ、輝く光の筋へと変わっていき、やがて炎の渦の中に、あなたと彼だけが残った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne zieht dich zu sich. Seine Hände sind hart wie Stein, aber seine Berührung ist voller Angst und Zärtlichkeit. Als ihr einander in die Augen schaut, verschwimmen die Flammen, und bald gibt es nur noch dich und ihn in einem wirbelnden Feuerstrudel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne zieht dich zu sich. Seine Hände sind hart wie Stein, aber seine Berührung ist voller Angst und Zärtlichkeit. Als ihr einander in die Augen schaut, verschwimmen die Flammen, und bald gibt es nur noch dich und ihn in einem wirbelnden Feuerstrudel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous attire à lui. Ses mains rugueuses tremblent, mais une certaine tendresse émane de ses gestes. Alors que vous plongez votre regard dans le sien, les flammes en mouvement se muent en traînées lumineuses, et bientôt, vous êtes seuls au monde dans un vortex de feu tourbillonnant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous attire à lui. Ses mains rugueuses tremblent, mais une certaine tendresse émane de ses gestes. Alors que vous plongez votre regard dans le sien, les flammes en mouvement se muent en traînées lumineuses, et bientôt, vous êtes seuls au monde dans un vortex de feu tourbillonnant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne te guía hacia su cuerpo con manos tan firmes como la piedra, pero llenas de inquietud y dulzura. Mientras os miráis a los ojos, las llamas se desdibujan en borrones, y pronto solo estáis él y tú en una vorágine de fuego.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne te guía hacia su cuerpo con manos tan firmes como la piedra, pero llenas de inquietud y dulzura. Mientras os miráis a los ojos, las llamas se desdibujan en borrones, y pronto solo estáis él y tú en una vorágine de fuego.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙将你拉向他。他的手仿佛石头一样坚硬，但他的触碰颤抖着，充满了温情。你们凝视着对方的双眼，眼前的烈焰变得模糊，变成了发光的条纹。没过多久，火焰的漩涡似乎吞噬了一切，只剩下你们两人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙将你拉向他。他的手仿佛石头一样坚硬，但他的触碰颤抖着，充满了温情。你们凝视着对方的双眼，眼前的烈焰变得模糊，变成了发光的条纹。没过多久，火焰的漩涡似乎吞噬了一切，只剩下你们两人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne seni kendisine çekiyor. Elleri taş gibi sert ancak dokunuşu ise titrek ve şefkat dolu. Birbirinizin gözlerinin içine bakarken alevler bulanıklaşıyor, parlak çizgilere dönüşüyor ve çok geçmeden orada yalnızca ikiniz ve etrafınızdaki alev cümbüşü kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne pulls you toward him, his hands as hard as stone but his touch full of trepidation and tenderness. As you stare into each other's eyes, the flames blur, turning into glowing streaks, and soon it is just you and him in a whirling vortex of fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, seni kendisine çekiyor. Elleri taş gibi sert ancak dokunuşu ise titrek ve şefkat dolu. Birbirinizin gözlerinin içine bakarken alevler bulanıklaşıyor, parlak çizgilere dönüşüyor ve çok geçmeden orada yalnızca ikiniz ve etrafınızdaki alev cümbüşü kalıyor.{/n}

{n}Solomorne'un elleri taş gibi sert ancak ama dokunuşu titrek ve şefkat doludur. Uyum içinde dans ederken birbirinizin gözlerine bakarsınız. Alevler bulanıklaşır, parlak çizgiler hâline gelir. O an orada yalnızca ikiniz ve etrafınızdaki alev cümbüşü kalır.{/n}
